mapper.subject: Subject: Video Already Uploaded: {{3.`0`}} - Upload Today’s Video
mapper.html:
Hi,

The following last video has already been uploaded to YouTube:

- Title: {{3.`0`}}
- Description: {{3.`1`}}
- Upload Date: {{3.`3`}}
You can watch the video here: {{3.`5`}}

Please upload today’s video ({{formatDate(now; "YYYY-MM-DD")}}) if you haven’t already.

Thanks, Your YouTube Auto-Uploader Team
